EmailTemplate.description: This is the standard email template to be used when sending reminder notifications to employees that their Timesheet has not been submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Standard Email - Timesheet - Employee - Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: IMPORTANT: {!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Payment_Entity__c} Timesheet has NOT been submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Employee_First_Name__c},
It appears that you have not submitted your timesheet for last week for your {!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Assignment_Name__c} role at {!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Client_Name__c}.
The cut off for submitting timesheets is 12.00 noon Monday.
It is important that you submit your timesheet immediately to be included in this weekâ€™s payroll.
Please log into the Employee Portal ASAP to view and submit your timesheet.
If you require any assistance, please contact your {!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Payment_Entity__c} Consultant or {!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Timesheet_Support__c} on {!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Timesheet_Support_Contact__c}.
Yours Sincerely,
{!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Payment_Entity__c}
